body_html: @AkonLau I have the same issue and previously I didn't notice that symeig is running on the CPU. Then I found that symeig takes all the CPU even though my matrix is a CUDA float tensor. I wonder if you have found a work around to have symeig running on the GPU. Thanks!
body_text: @AkonLau I have the same issue and previously I didn't notice that symeig is running on the CPU. Then I found that symeig takes all the CPU even though my matrix is a CUDA float tensor. I wonder if you have found a work around to have symeig running on the GPU. Thanks!
body: @AkonLau I have the same issue and previously I didn't notice that symeig is running on the CPU. Then I found that symeig takes all the CPU even though my matrix is a CUDA float tensor. I wonder if you have found a work around to have symeig running on the GPU. Thanks!
